archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.1.7c: c) privacy by design and privacy by default principles (e.g. how to obtain consent to process data, how to opt-in to data processing and how to present privacy notices)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
